content.question: The function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals e to the power of 2 x end exponent"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></math>, and the function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals ln open parentheses 3 x close parentheses"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>. For <math alttext="x greater than 0"><mi>x</mi><mo>></mo><mn>0</mn></math>, which of the following is an expression for <math alttext="f open parentheses g open parentheses x close parentheses close parentheses"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></mrow></mfenced></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parentheses e to the power of 2 x end exponent close parentheses times ln open parentheses 3 x close parentheses"><mfenced><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mfenced><mo>Â·</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfenced></math>

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
